tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlayerPerformance (
 player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 player_name VARCHAR(50),
 games_played INT,
 total_points INT,
 average_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE player_metrics (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    games_played INT,
    total_score INT,
    average_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    improvement_areas TEXT,
    development_areas TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_player_id FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_metrics(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    score INT,
    score_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_info (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    skill_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE game_scores (
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    score INT,
    date_played DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_info(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_training (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    training_date DATE,
    duration_hours INT,
    skill_area VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_info(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_goals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    goal_description TEXT,
    deadline DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_info(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_category VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_info(player_id)
);
